tech_header.paragraph: Our team is ready and prepared to assist you with the main technologies in the market, both at the backend and frontend levels.

tech_data.title: WSO2
tech_data.paragraph: WSO2 is a leading open source platform for building, integrating, and managing APIs, applications, and microservices. With its flexible architecture and comprehensive set of integrated tools, WSO2 helps organizations drive digital transformation by delivering seamless and secure experiences to customers, partners, and employees.

description.title: Installation and Configuration
description.subTitle: HOW CAN WE HELP?
description.paragraph: Our team is prepared to help you connect your applications and set up your middleware architecture with the open-source WSO2 platform.

description.title: Platform
description.paragraph: WSO2 provides a series of tools and solutions to help companies manage and implement APIs, integrate applications and data, and provide security and compliance for digital operations. The tool is widely used in corporate IT environments to help connect systems and enable collaboration between different departments and systems.

description.subTitle: WSO2 PRODUCTS
description.title: The entire middleware stack
description.paragraph:
WSO2 API Manager: API management platform.
WSO2 Micro Integrator: Application integration platform
WSO2 Identity Server: Identity management platform.

description.title: WSO2 API Manager
description.subTitle: WSO2
description.paragraph: WSO2 API Manager is a comprehensive solution for managing APIs throughout their lifecycle. With features such as API creation, publishing, management, and monetization, the WSO2 API Manager streamlines the process of developing and delivering secure and scalable APIs.

description.subTitle: Capabilities
description.title: Easily and securely expose APIs to both internal and external consumers.
description.paragraph: Implement industry-standard authorization flows — such as OAuth, OpenID Connect, and JWTs — out of the box and integrate with your existing identity access or key management tools.

description.title: Enable design and runtime governance for the entire lifecycle of your APIs.
description.paragraph: Build APIs from existing services, manage APIs from internally built applications and from third-party providers, and monitor their usage and performance from inception to retirement.

description.title: Get business insights and intelligence through APIs.
description.paragraph: Provide real-time access to API usage and performance statistics to decision-makers to optimize your developer support, continuously improve your services, and drive further adoption to reach your business goals.

description.title: Flexible deployment models adapt to your infrastructure while keeping service discovery seamless for developers.
description.paragraph: Deploy in the cloud, in your private data centers, or anywhere in between while cataloging your services in a single location to make it easy for your developers to find what they need to efficiently build their applications.

description.title: Support modern services including REST, GraphQL, and Async API, and integrate your API workflows with your CI/CD pipeline.
description.paragraph: Strategically adopt modern service delivery and development paradigms without leaving behind the legacy systems that made you successful in the first place.

description.title: Advanced integration support.
description.paragraph: The integration runtime supports creating composite microservices, service, and API hosting needs, message routing, transformation, message mediation, service orchestration, as well as consuming and processing streaming data.

description.title: Powerful Graphical / CLI tooling.
description.paragraph: Complete API development support with API publisher. Visually design, develop, debug, test, and deploy integration flows with Integration Studio. Complete set of commands to manage API gateway and micro integrator runtimes with API controller (CLI) tool

tech_data.title: Spring / Spring Boot
tech_data.paragraph: Spring and Spring Boot are popular Java frameworks that are widely used in developing enterprise applications.

description.title: What is Spring?
description.subTitle: SPRING
description.paragraph: Spring is a lightweight framework that is used to develop enterprise applications, it provides a comprehensive infrastructure support for developing Java applications. It provides a lot of features such as support for dependency injection, a modular architecture, and the ability to integrate with other technologies.

description.subTitle: SPRING BOOT
description.title: What is Spring Boot?
description.paragraph: Spring Boot is a convention-over-configuration framework that builds on top of Spring. It makes it easy to create stand-alone, production-grade Spring applications by providing a set of tools and libraries that simplify common tasks. Spring Boot provides features such as auto-configuration, the ability to run as a standalone application, and a command-line interface.

description.subTitle: BENEFITS
description.title: Why is it a good choice to use Spring
description.paragraph: There are many benefits to using Spring and Spring Boot for your enterprise application development projects. One of the main benefits is ease of development. Spring and Spring Boot provide a set of tools and libraries that simplify common tasks, making it easier to develop enterprise applications. Testability is another benefit of using Spring and Spring Boot, as they make it easy to write unit and integration tests for your application. Additionally, they are flexible and can be used to develop a wide range of applications, from simple web applications to complex microservices.

service_data.title: E-commerce
service_data.paragraph: Turn your online presence into profits: Custom solutions for your e-commerce store.

description.subTitle: The Power of an e-commerce
description.paragraph: With the growth of the internet and the increased demand for online shopping, creating an E-commerce platform has become essential for the success of any business. In the current digital era, having a strong online presence is crucial in reaching new customers and increasing profits.

description.subTitle: SOLUTIONS
description.title: How we can help
description.paragraph: As a software company, we offer complete solutions for creating E-commerce platforms for all types of businesses, from large companies to small shops. We use the latest technologies to ensure our clients have a modern and functional E-commerce platform.

description.subTitle: technology
description.title: Why is it a good choice to work with us
description.paragraph: Our team of technology experts works tirelessly to ensure our clients have the best possible user experience. We use technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and frameworks like React and Angular to create fast and responsive E-commerce platforms. Furthermore, we use content management platforms like Shopify to ensure our clients have an intuitive and user-friendly administration panel.

description.subTitle: technology
description.title: Shopify
description.paragraph: Shopify is a complete and user-friendly E-commerce platform. It's a great option for businesses of all sizes, from small shops to large companies. Shopify offers a wide variety of customizable design templates, advanced security features, integrations with external apps and services, as well as support for various payment options and shipping methods. With Shopify, you can manage your online store, add products, process payments, and track statistics in an easy and intuitive way.

description.subTitle: CUSTOMIZATION
description.title: We create your e-commerce in a customized way
description.paragraph: We offer custom E-commerce templates to meet the unique needs of each client. Whether you're a small local shop looking to expand your online presence or a large company looking to optimize your sales, we have the right solution for you. Our templates are designed to be flexible and scalable, so you can keep up with the growth of your business.

description.subTitle: Support
description.title: Our support is continuous, we work with the best cloud solutions on the market.
description.paragraph: In addition to offering high-quality E-commerce solutions, we also offer continuous support and regular updates to ensure your platform is always functioning in the most efficient way possible. Our support team is always available to help you with any problems or questions that may arise. if you're looking for a reliable and efficient E-commerce solution, we have what you need. Contact us today for more information and start expanding your online business.

service_data.title: Mobile App
service_data.paragraph: Have your business available on any device.

description.subTitle: Be anywhere
description.paragraph: Developing a mobile application can be an effective way to improve your business's digital presence, better engage customers, and improve the efficiency of internal processes. A mobile application brings a series of strategic advantages that have an impact on business development.

description.subTitle: SOLUTIONS
description.title: How we can help
description.paragraph: We offer complete solutions for creating applications for mobile devices, such as smartphones and tablets. We use the latest technologies from various development platforms available to create mobile applications, including iOS, Android, and other platforms.

description.subTitle: technology
description.title: Why it's a good choice to work with us
description.paragraph: Our team of technology experts is prepared to continuously help plan and structure your project. We will be by your side to add value to your company and develop according to your project's requirements, whether it's native, hybrid, or cross-platform development.

description.subTitle: technology
description.title: Native Development
description.paragraph: It is the most common type of mobile development, in which the application is developed specifically for a specific mobile platform, such as iOS or Android. This type of development allows for maximum use of platform resources, such as hardware and operating system features.

description.subTitle: technology
description.title: Hybrid Development
description.paragraph: It is a type of mobile development that combines elements of native and web development. It is built using web technologies (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript) and is packaged inside a native application, allowing access to device features. Hybrid applications usually have a single codebase that can be used to create versions for multiple platforms.

description.subTitle: technology
description.title: Cross-Platform Development
description.paragraph: Cross-platform refers to technologies or approaches that allow for developing applications that work on different platforms, such as iOS and Android. With the use of these technologies, it is possible to create applications that work on multiple platforms with a single codebase, which can save time and money in development.

service_data.title: Custom Software Development
service_data.paragraph: Have an exclusive and tailored software to meet the needs of your company.

description.subTitle: Why Use Custom Software?
description.paragraph: Custom software development is an attractive option for companies that have specific needs that cannot be met by off-the-shelf solutions. It can provide a more precise and effective solution for the company's needs, improving overall operational efficiency and helping the company achieve its business objectives.

description.subTitle: Solutions
description.title: How We Can Help
description.paragraph: Our team is prepared to work closely with the client to understand the software needs and requirements and create a customized solution that meets the client's specifications. We will be present from start to finish, continuously helping with all aspects of development, such as functional and non-functional requirements, usability, scalability, software security, and maintenance.

description.subTitle: Advantages
description.title: Meets Specific Needs of Your Company
description.paragraph: Custom software is developed to meet the specific needs of the business, which means it can be designed to seamlessly integrate with the company's business processes and meet its unique needs.

description.subTitle: Advantages
description.title: Increased Security
description.paragraph: Custom software can be designed to include advanced security features that can protect confidential information of clients, employees, and other stakeholders.

description.subTitle: Advantages
description.title: Greater ROI
description.paragraph: Custom software can provide a higher return on investment (ROI) than off-the-shelf software, especially in the long run, as it is tailored to the client's specific needs and can improve the efficiency and productivity of the company.

description.subTitle: Technology
description.title: We Help Choose the Best Technology
description.paragraph: Depending on the organization's goals and specific needs, there are various technologies that can be used in custom software development. Our team is prepared to develop using the best technological solutions on the market. Visit our technologies page by clicking here to learn more.

cloud_header.title: Cloud Servers
cloud_header.paragraph: We are using the best cloud solutions to support our projects, utilizing multiple high performance cloud platforms to ensure our projects run smoothly and efficiently. This cloud solution is likely to be chosen based on the company's specific needs and requirements and provides the necessary features, scalability and reliability to support its projects.

cloud_data.title: GOOGLE CLOUD PLATFORM
cloud_data.subTitle: ACCELERATE YOUR DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION
cloud_data.paragraph: Google Cloud is a cloud computing platform offered by Google. It offers a wide variety of products and services including computing, storage, networking, and artificial intelligence. The platform also offers options for scalability, high availability, and security. In addition, Google Cloud has integrations with other Google tools and services such as Google Drive and Google Analytics.

cloud_data.title: DigitalOcean
cloud_data.subTitle: Drive business growth
cloud_data.paragraph: DigitalOcean is another popular cloud platform. It primarily focuses on offering simple and easy-to-use virtual servers, called "droplets." It also offers storage, networking and other similar resources to those offered by Google Cloud. The main difference is that DigitalOcean is more simple and easy-to-use, while Google Cloud is more robust and scalable.

cloud_data.title: VERCEL
cloud_data.subTitle: Right Platform for Developers
cloud_data.paragraph: Vercel is another cloud platform option that is gaining popularity. It is a platform-as-a-service (PaaS) that is focused on web development and hosting. It offers a variety of features including automatic HTTPS, continuous deployment, and global CDN. It also offers a simple and easy-to-use interface for managing and deploying web projects. Vercel is a great choice for teams that are focused on web development and want a simple and fast way to deploy and host their projects. Vercel is also known for its fast and reliable hosting for static sites and Jamstack projects. It integrates well with other development tools and frameworks such as React, Vue, and Next.js making it a great choice for web development teams.

about_us_header.title: About Us
about_us_header.paragraph: We are CodeBe, a software company specialized in developing customized solutions for our clients.

about_us_data.subTitle: Who are We
about_us_data.paragraph:
CodeBe was born from a dream and passion for technology of three friends. Before founding the company, each of them worked for many years for large technology companies all over the world. After a lot of experience and learning, they decided to come together to make this dream of starting their own technology company a reality.

With a lot of dedication and passion, they founded CodeBe, a company specializing in custom software solutions for their clients. We believe that every business is unique and therefore every solution should be developed according to each client's specific needs..

In addition, we offer continuous support to our clients, ensuring that the developed solutions continue to function efficiently and are always up-to-date.

Our development team is highly qualified and experienced, and we work with the latest technologies and methodologies to ensure that our projects are delivered with quality and within the established deadline. In addition, we offer continuous support to our clients, ensuring that the developed solutions continue to function efficiently and are always up-to-date.

We are passionate about technology and believe it can transform the world around us. That is why we work tirelessly to provide high-quality custom solutions for our clients. We are eager to work with you and help you achieve your business goals with our software solutions.
Contact us.
